Title: Klaq-Trok
Legend: A hulking mass of scale and muscle, Klaq-Trok speaks little even for one of his taciturn breed. Yet when war calls, the saurus is swift to answer, and the savagery with which he annihilates his enemies is wholly inspiring to the Starblood Stalkers.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Single, Unique. Kixi-Taka the Diviner, Klaq-Trok and The Starblood Stalkers must be taken as a set. Although taken as a set, each is a separate unit.

Intro: Klaq-Trok is armed with a Celestite Warmaul.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Shadowstrike Starhost • Shadowstrike Temple-host • Sunclaw Temple-host

Rules.Name: Savage Protector
Rules.Fluff: A warrior unparalleled in his primal ferocity and strength, Klaq-Trok crushes any who would dare endanger the will of the Old Ones.
Rules.Rule: You can re-roll hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks made by this unit while it is within 3" of a friendly KIXI-TAKA.

Rules.Name: Bolstering Presence
Rules.Fluff: The skinks of the Starblood Stalkers fear no foe as long as Klaq-Trok is nearby.
Rules.Rule: Add 3 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly THE STARBLOOD STALKERS units while they are wholly within 9" of this unit.

Rules.Name: Mighty Saurus Jaws
Rules.Fluff: The powerful jaws of this saurus can tear apart the enemy in a brutal display until nothing is left but a bloody pulp.
Rules.Rule: Each time this unit fights, after all of its attacks have been resolved, pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this unit and roll 3 dice. These dice rolls are referred to as bite rolls. For each bite roll of 6+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
